pr_title: KOGITO-2498 DMN info/warn as response headers

timeline.message: KOGITO-2498 DMN info/warn as response headers
Make codegen compilation work by resolving all expected reasteasy symbls

timeline.bodyText: What about an assertion to verify that header value starts with warning prefix?
timeline.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText:
it's only a helper feature [...] In fact this is more experimental because long story short the variant of DMN which uses the business domain + structured messages in the response is the one any client shall use if they need to process the messages

Hence no, the intent here is to show something is or is not available as a header, but no intention of setting an example how to parse it since it is not meant to be automatically parsed
replies.author: tarilabs

timeline.author: danielezonca
